pr_title: HIVE-24530: Potential NPE in FileSinkOperator.closeRecordwriters method

timeline.message: HIVE-24530: Potential NPE in FileSinkOperator.closeRecordwriters method

timeline.bodyText: So now there is a null check for the RecordWriter instances in this list, but shouldn't we also check for the list itself (rowOutWriters) being null here?
timeline.author: szlta

replies.bodyText: You're right, I added a null check for the rowOutWriters as well.
replies.author: kuczoram
